text: The Dangote Group is a Nigerian multinational industrial conglomerate, founded by the richest black man Aliko Dangote. It is the largest conglomerate in West Africa and one of the largest on the African continent. == Biography == Dangote Group was founded in 1981 as a trading enterprise, importing sugar, cement, rice, fisheries, and other consumer goods for distribution in the Nigeria market. == References == Category:1980s establishments in Africa Category:Conglomerate companies Category:Companies of Nigeria
title: Dangote Group
